info.title: Gravity Glide
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
I'm not sure how to describe this. It is more of a toy then a game. You create areas of momentum to move things with. It supports the use of up to 4 wiimotes at a time.

Controls:
Pointer = Aim
A button = Pull
B button = Push

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (White Cube Art Noise) by essesq
ccmixter.org/people/essesq
